BookingValidation.phone: Phone number is required and must be valid.
BookingValidation.bookingInfo: After submitting your information, our team will contact you directly via WhatsApp or the mobile number you provided to inform you of the price and other details.

labels: Enjoy the best Hajj experience this year with our exclusive offers that combine quality and value. We offer you a distinguished Hajj journey at unmatched prices, including all the services you need for an unforgettable spiritual experience.

Emaar Grand Hotel is located on the bustling Ibrahim Khalil Street in Mecca, just 750 meters from the Grand Mosque. It features elegantly decorated rooms and a restaurant that offers room service around the clock.
TUI MAGIC LIFE Kalawy, located beachfront in Hurghada, is a 5-star accommodation featuring a garden, shared lounge, and restaurant. The property also offers guests a kids' club and a playground.

Set in El Alamein, 17 km from Porto Marina, Azur One Eleven Hotel Alamein offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Among the various facilities of this property are a bar and a private beach area. The accommodation features room service and free WiFi

The Grand Cosmopolitan Hotel is located in Dubai, 7.7 km from Jumeirah Beach. It offers accommodation with 3 restaurants, free private parking, an outdoor pool, and a fitness center. The property also includes family rooms and provides guests with a children's playground. Additionally, the property features a 24-hour front desk, room service, and currency exchange for guests.

This hotel was built in 1910 during the period between the late 19th century and World War I. It boasts an ideal location in the heart of Paris, with easy access to the city's tourist attractions. The guest rooms feature elegant decor
